Overview   Package  Class  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package org.sd.wn

Interface Summary
PointerFilter A strategy for filtering pointers from expansion by a word sense wrapper.
WordSenseOperator Interface for operating on a word sense.
 

Class Summary
BasePointerFilter Base implementation of the pointer filter interface.
CollectSensesOperator A word sense operator to collect word senses.
CommonSenseFinder Utility class for finding common senses.
CommonSenseOperator A word sense operator to find a common (or shared) sense along the relation chain of one sense while expanding another.
ConjugationLexicon A lexicon for recognizing conjugated verbs using simple rules and WordNet's verb exception file.
ConsistentPointerFilter A pointer filter that only accepts expansions to senses that are consistent with their sources.
GraphGenerator Utility class for generating word graphs.
IrregularInflections Class to manage WordNet irregular inflection file data.
NounBag Container class for managing word net's nouns as a bag of words.
NounTagger Utility to identify words that could be a noun (ignoring context).
RegularConjugations Utility for regular English conjugations.
RegularConjugations.Word  
SenseIndex Class to hold a WordNet sense index in memory.
SenseIndex.Entries  
SenseIndex.Entry  
ShowSenseOperator A word sense operator for showing related senses.
SingleRelationFilter A pointer filter that only expands along a single relation.
TaggedWord Structure to hold a word with its possible parts of speech.
UnlimitedPointerFilter A pointer filter with no limits (other than not expanding directly back to a source).
Word2Dot Utility class for creating a dot-formatted graph from a word and its senses.
Word2DotOperator A word sense operator for generating a dot-formatted graph from a word sense and its expansions.
WordForm Structure to hold a word form.
WordId Structure to uniquely identify a word.
WordNetFile Utility to access data from a WordNet file.
WordNetFile.Entry  
WordNetFile.Frame  
WordNetFile.Pointer  
WordNetFile.Word  
WordNetIndex Class to hold a WordNet index in memory.
WordNetIndex.Entry Container class for index entry data.
WordNetLexicon Lexicon interface wrapper around word net lexicons.
WordNetUtils Utility methods.
WordSense Structure to hold a word sense.
WordSenseContainer Utility to manage word senses for an input word.
WordSenseIterator Iterator over word senses for input.
WordSenseWrapper Wrapper around a word sense for relationship traversal and context preservation.
 

Enum Summary
LexName Enumeration of lexicographer file names.
PointerSymbol Enumeration of WordNet pointer symbols.
POS Enumeration of part of speech types.
WordForm.Form  
 

Exception Summary
UnwindOperatorException An exception to use as a mechanism to halt recursive word sense expansion.
